question: Will Trump say "Crypto" during Elon interview?
description:
On Tuesday, Donald Trump said he will do "a major interview with Elon Musk" on the night of Monday, August 12.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Trump says "Crypto" during his interview with Elon Musk currently scheduled for August 12. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".  If no interview between Musk and Trump is publicly released by August 23, 2024, 11:59 PM ET this market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the word regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Compound words will count as long as "Crypto" is part of the compound word and references the meaning which refers to decentralized cryptocurrencies.

The resolution source will be the first publicly released footage of the interview, which includes substantial and continuous content.

description:

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Compound words will count as long as "trans" is part of the compound word and references the meaning which refers to sexual/gender identity which differs from ones sex at birth (i.e. "Transgender" counts).

The resolution source will be the first publicly released footage of the interview, which includes substantial and continuous content.

question: Will Ukraine hold Kursk through Aug 31?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Ukrainian forces maintain control of any part of the Kursk Oblast of Russia, through 11:59 PM ET on August 31, 2024. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".

If Ukrainian forces at any point no longer control any territory in the Kursk Oblast, this market will immediately resolve to "No".

Control is defined as Ukrainian forces being present and actively holding territory in the Kursk Oblast. 

The primary resolution source for this market will be maps and reports published by the Institute for the Study of War (https://www.arcgis.com/apps/mapviewer/index.html?webmap=9f04944a2fe84edab9da31750c2b15eb), however a consensus of credible reporting may also  be used.

question: Will Josh Allen be the top Fantasy Quarterback?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" of Josh Allen is the top scoring quarterback during the 2024 NFL season. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".

This market will be based on ESPN's FFL Points Per Reception (PPR) scoring, and refers to the totals for the entirety of the 2024-2025 NFL regular season. 

In case of a tie for the most points scored, this market will resolve in favor of the player whose last name comes first alphabetically. 

The resolution source for this market will be ESPN Fantasy https://fantasy.espn.com/football/leaders.

question: Megaquake in August?
description:
A "megaquake" is defined as an earthquake with a magnitude of 8.0 or greater.

This market will resolve to Yes if 1 or more earthquakes with a magnitude of 8.0 or higher occur anywhere on earth between August 11 and August 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise this market will resolve to No.

The resolution source for this market is the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Earthquake hazards program (https://earthquake.usgs.gov/earthquakes/browse/significant.php#sigdef).

If an earthquake of substantial size has occurred within this market's timeframe but not yet appeared on the resolution source, this market may remain open until September 7, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, or until the earthquake in question otherwise appears on the resolution source. If such an earthquake has not appeared on the resolution source by that date, another credible resolution source will be used.

question: Swan Bitcoin insolvent by August 31?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if official information released by Swan Bitcoin, official representatives of Swan Bitcoin (e.g. lawyers, spokespeople, etc.), or a consensus of credible reporting announces that Swan Bitcoin is insolvent or is filing/has filed for any variety of bankruptcy by August 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET.

This market will also resolve to "Yes" if Swan Bitcoin suspends Bitcoin withdrawals for a majority of users across its products for at least 7 consecutive days (168 hours) by August 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. This includes situations where a majority of users are unable to withdraw Bitcoin from Swan Bitcoin's products which are typically available for withdrawal. The primary resolution sources will be official statements from Swan Bitcoin, its representatives (e.g., lawyers, spokespeople), and a consensus of credible reporting.

If neither of the above criteria are met, this market will resolve to "No".

If Swan Bitcoin suspends withdrawals on a day in the last week of August (e.g. They halt token withdrawals on August 29, 2024, 4 PM ET), this market will not resolve until either: 1) withdrawals are reenabled before 7 full days (168 hours) pass, resulting in a "No" resolution; 2) 7 full days pass (August 29, 2024 - September 5, 2024, 4 PM ET) where withdrawals are suspended, resulting in a "Yes" resolution.

events.title: Swan Bitcoin insolvent by August 31?
events.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if official information released by Swan Bitcoin, official representatives of Swan Bitcoin (e.g. lawyers, spokespeople, etc.), or a consensus of credible reporting announces that Swan Bitcoin is insolvent or is filing/has filed for any variety of bankruptcy by August 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET.

This market will also resolve to "Yes" if Swan Bitcoin suspends Bitcoin withdrawals for a majority of users across its products for at least 7 consecutive days (168 hours) by August 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. This includes situations where a majority of users are unable to withdraw Bitcoin from Swan Bitcoin's products which are typically available for withdrawal. The primary resolution sources will be official statements from Swan Bitcoin, its representatives (e.g., lawyers, spokespeople), and a consensus of credible reporting.

If neither of the above criteria are met, this market will resolve to "No".

If Swan Bitcoin suspends withdrawals on a day in the last week of August (e.g. They halt token withdrawals on August 29, 2024, 4 PM ET), this market will not resolve until either: 1) withdrawals are reenabled before 7 full days (168 hours) pass, resulting in a "No" resolution; 2) 7 full days pass (August 29, 2024 - September 5, 2024, 4 PM ET) where withdrawals are suspended, resulting in a "Yes" resolution.

This market will be based on ESPNs FFL Points Per Reception (PPR) scoring, and refers to the totals for the entirety of the 2024-2025 NFL regular season.

question: Special counsel investigates Clarence Thomas in 2024?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if a special counsel investigation into U.S. Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas is publicly announced by the Department of Justice (DOJ) between August 11 and December 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Investigations or inquiries not conducted by a special counsel or initiated by entities other than the DOJ will not be considered for this market.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US Government.

events.title: Special counsel investigates Clarence Thomas in 2024?
events.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if a special counsel investigation into U.S. Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas is publicly announced by the Department of Justice (DOJ) between August 11 and December 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Investigations or inquiries not conducted by a special counsel or initiated by entities other than the DOJ will not be considered for this market.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US Government.

question: Will Christian McCaffrey be the top Fantasy Running Back?
description:
This market will resolve to Yes if Christian McCaffrey is the top scoring running back during the 2024 NFL season. Otherwise, this market will resolve to No.

This market will be based on ESPNs FFL Points Per Reception (PPR) scoring, and refers to the totals for the entirety of the 2024-2025 NFL regular season.

In case of a tie for the most points scored, this market will resolve in favor of the player whose last name comes first alphabetically.

The resolution source for this market will be ESPN Fantasy https://fantasy.espn.com/football/leaders.
